#summary iStock Lightbox Tool (Advanced for Firefox/Chrome)
#labels Featured

= Summary =

Easy add/remove of files to lightboxes

= Features =

Additional functionality compared to the [http://code.google.com/p/istock-greasemonkey-tools/wiki/iStockLightboxTool regular tool]

  * The script will remember last selected lightbox
  * Additional menu to show/hide the interface

= Notes =

Additional functionality available on Firefox and Chrome only. For other browsers please use the [http://code.google.com/p/istock-greasemonkey-tools/wiki/iStockLightboxTool regular tool].
